turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where would you like me to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on 242 in Conroe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, Of Course. Would you like foam on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, foam is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any specific flavor you want in the latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Vanilla please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a specific type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I prefer to have almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What if they are out of almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then regular milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like regular or 2%.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk is preferable.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will leave right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Here is your vanilla latte. They had almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
